Aura.Chaos Aura: Give yourself random boons and your foe random conditions whenever you are struck.
Aura.Dark Aura: Surrounded by a dark aura that reduces incoming condition damage and causes torment each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).
Aura.Fire Aura: Enveloped in a fiery shield that burns foes, grants might each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).
Aura.Frost Aura: Chill foes that strike you (only once per second for each attacker); incoming damage is reduced by 10%.
Aura.Light Aura: When struck, you gain retaliation. Incoming condition damage is reduced by 10%.
Aura.Shocking Aura: Stun nearby attacking foes with an electric shock (only once per 2 seconds for each attacker).

Boon.Aegis: Block the next incoming attack; stacks duration.
Boon.Fury: Critical Chance increased by 20%; stacks duration.
Boon.Protection: Incoming damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.
Boon.Regeneration: Gain health every second; stacks duration.
Boon.Resistance: Conditions currently on you are ineffective; stacks duration.
Boon.Retaliation: Reflect incoming damage back to its source; sBoontacks duration.
Boon.Stability: Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared or taunted.
Boon.Swiftness: Movement speed increased by 33%; stacks duration.
Boon.Vigor: Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.

Condition.Bleeding: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Condition.Blinded: Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.
Condition.Burning: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Condition.Chilled: Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.
Condition.Confusion: Damage received on skill activation; stacks intensity.
Condition.Crippled: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.
Condition.Fear: Involuntary retreat; unable to act; stacks duration.
Condition.Poisoned: Deals damage every second; decreases healing effectiveness 33%; damage stacks intensity.
Condition.Torment: Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to moving foes. Stacks intensity.
Condition.Vulnerability: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.
Condition.Weakness: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.

Effect.Agony: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity; reduces incoming healing and barrier application by 70% per stack; damage is reduced by agony resistance.
Effect.Stealth: Currently invisible. Ends if you deal damage.

Mistlock Instability.Adrenaline Rush: When enraged, enemies deal 150% increased damage while they're low on health. Enemies deal 20% less damage when not enraged.
Mistlock Instability.Afflicted: Outgoing resistance duration is increased by 50%. Enemies apply random conditions.
Mistlock Instability.Boon Overload: Each boon increases incoming strike damage by 5%. Outgoing boon duration is increased by 20%.
Mistlock Instability.Flux Bomb: You are periodically afflicted by the Anomaly's flux bombs. Flux bombs apply to both allies and enemies.
Mistlock Instability.Fractal Vindicators: Fractal Avengers are replaced by more-powerful Fractal Vindicators.
Mistlock Instability.Frailty: Players are smaller and have 30% less health, but move 25% faster.
Mistlock Instability.Hamstrung: Low health increasingly slows your movements. Endurance regenerates 33% faster.
Mistlock Instability.Last Laugh: Enemies explode upon dying if not stunned. Stunned enemies apply protection and stability to nearby allies.
Mistlock Instability.Mists Convergence: The Fractals of the Mists are blurring together...
Mistlock Instability.No Pain, No Gain:
Enemies receive boons when hit. Stripping an enemy boon will steal their life.
(Cooldown: 20 seconds)
Mistlock Instability.Outflanked: Foes within 300 range do 300% damage when attacking from behind, but only 75% damage when attacking head on.
Mistlock Instability.Social Awkwardness: Players will be pushed away from one another.
Mistlock Instability.Stick Together: Take 60% increased damage when not within 300 range of an ally. Take 20% reduced damage when within 300 range of an ally.
Mistlock Instability.Sugar Rush: Increases movement speed and attack speed by 15%. Elite and lower enemies' movement speed and attack speed increases by 35%.
Mistlock Instability.Toxic Trail: Enemies leave a path of poison behind them. Blocking a toxic trail attack will absorb it and cleanse the condition.
Mistlock Instability.Vengeance: When enemies die, they enhance nearby foes with multiple boons; does not apply to elite foes. Strip any enemy boon to inflict them with weakness.
Mistlock Instability.We Bleed Fire: Enemies create flaming missiles when damaged. Incoming condition damage is reduced by 20%.
